title: Develop a functional driving experience with simplified physics.
description: This task is to implement the core driving mechanics of the game. This includes vehicle controls (acceleration, braking, steering) and a simplified, arcade-style physics model. The goal is a satisfying and fun driving experience, not a realistic simulation.

title: Research and acquire free game assets (3D models, textures, sounds) compatible with a low-poly, web-based game.
description: This task involves researching and identifying sources for free, royalty-free game assets, including 3D models (for trucks, trailers, environment props), textures, and sound effects. The assets should be compatible with a low-poly, web-based game development approach and should be acquired with appropriate licensing for commercial use.

title: Develop core UI: in-game HUD with a mini-map, and a simple job selection screen.
description: This task involves creating the essential user interface elements for the game. This includes the in-game Heads-Up Display (HUD) with a speedometer, a mini-map or GPS display, and a simple screen for players to select jobs.

title: Generate a procedural road network for a small, representative section of Mindanao (e.g., between Davao and Cagayan de Oro) using OpenStreetMaps data.
description: This task is to take the raw OpenStreetMaps data and use it to procedurally generate the 3D road network in the game. For the MVP, this will be limited to a small, representative section of Mindanao, such as the route between Davao and Cagayan de Oro.

title: Download or export roads data from OpenStreetMaps for the whole Mindanao island.
description: Before the game can generate the world, we need the raw road data. This task involves using a tool or script to download or export the road network data for the entire island of Mindanao from OpenStreetMaps. The data should include highways, primary, and secondary roads. This will be a one-time process to get the data, which will then be processed for the game.

title: Implement one (1) playable truck model.
description: This task is to integrate the first playable truck into the game. This involves taking the 3D model of the truck and making it controllable by the player within the game world.

title: Implement a simple economy: earn money from jobs.
description: This task is to create the basic economic loop of the game. Players should earn in-game currency for successfully completing jobs. This provides the motivation for players to take on and complete jobs.

title: Create a basic job system: pick up cargo from one city, deliver to another.
description: This task is to implement the core gameplay loop of picking up and delivering cargo. This includes creating a system where players can select a job, which will have a starting location and a destination.

title: Create basic assets: low-poly models for the truck, one trailer type, and essential environment props (trees, a few building types).
description: This task is to create the 3D models and textures for the MVP. This includes one low-poly truck model, one type of trailer, and basic environmental assets like trees and simple buildings. The art style should be low-poly and stylized to ensure good performance on the web.
